snippet: A federal judge said Ashley Diamond had not proved prison authorities’ “deliberate indifference” to her fear of sexual assault and harassment.
abstract: Federal Judge Marc T Treadwell denies transgender Georgia inmate Ashley Diamond's request for transfer to lower-security prison; Diamond claims that her transfer to Georgia State, prison that used to house state’s most dangerous inmates, is in retaliation for lawsuit she filed that brought and end to Georgia's blanket denial of new hormone therapy to transgender inmates.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge said Ashley Diamond had not proved prison authorities’ “deliberate indifference” to her fear of sexual assault and harassment.

headline.main: Judge Denies Transgender Inmate’s Request for Transfer
headline.print_headline: Judge Denies Transgender Inmate’s Request for Transfer
